data.name: Label.NewApplicationNeeded
data.value: Need to upgrade the current version, please download the new version to login.
data.comment: Text letting the user know that they need to upgrade their app to use Roblox. Created by dgriffin@roblox.com Modified by <TranslationProviderSynchronizer> Created by dgriffin@roblox.com Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: Message.ApkInstallPermission
data.value: Before we get started, you might have to click the SETTINGS and Allow app installs.
data.comment: Informational message telling the user they may need to allow app installs for Roblox/Luobu app to do automatic upgrade. Created by dgriffin@roblox.com Modified by <TranslationProviderSynchronizer> Created by dgriffin@roblox.com Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: Title.ApkExternalStoragePermission
data.value: Roblox wants to access your storage
data.comment: Title of the storage permissions prompt. Created by dgriffin@roblox.com Modified by <TranslationProviderSynchronizer> Created by dgriffin@roblox.com Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: Message.ApkExternalStoragePermission
data.value: Used to upgrade the application. If access to the external storage is not allowed, the upgrade will not be possible and the application will be closed.
data.comment: External storage permission warning. Created by dgriffin@roblox.com Modified by <TranslationProviderSynchronizer> Created by dgriffin@roblox.com Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: Message.DownloadError
data.value: Please check the internet connection for downloading the new APK.
data.comment: Error message shown when APK download fails Created by dgriffin@roblox.com Modified by <TranslationProviderSynchronizer> Created by dgriffin@roblox.com Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: Response.LuobuUpgradeBodyString
data.value: Your Luobu version is out of date and cannot run correctly. You need to download the latest version to continue.
data.comment: 你的罗布乐思版本已过时，无法正确运行。需要下载最新版本以升级。 Created by dgriffin@roblox.com Modified by <TranslationProviderSynchronizer> Created by dgriffin@roblox.com Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.comment: Created by <Unknown> Modified by <TranslationProviderSynchronizer> Created by <Unknown> Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.value: Your version of Roblox is out of date and will not work properly. Taking you to the {var1} for an upgrade.
